title: Value Tolerance Checker by Time
name: LGF_IsValueInToleranceByTime
description: Checks if a given value is within a specified tolerance in percent of a given set point.

input.name: value
input.description: Value to check if in range of setpoint

input.name: lowerMinimum
input.description: Lower limit/tolerance of the setpoint in percent or absolut

input.name: upperMaximum
input.description: Upper limit/tolerance of the setpoint in percent or absolut

output.name: overHighLimit
output.description: TRUE: if value is above high limit

output.name: belowLowLimit
output.description: TRUE: if value is below low limit

output.name: inLimits
output.description: TRUE: if value is in between the limits

output.name: setpointChange
output.description: TRUE: when a setpoint change has been detected

member.name: disableLimits
member.description: TRUE: Disable the monitoring timer. Leaving the tolerance triggers immediately

member.name: limitsAsAbsoluteValues
member.description: TRUE: Limit given as absolut value / FALSE: Limits given as tolerance from setpoint

member.name: toleranceAsAbsoluteValues
member.description: TRUE: Toleranze given as absolut value / FALSE: Toleranze in percent from Setpoint

member.name: upperLimitMonitoringTime
member.description: Monitoring time for the upper limit violation

member.name: lowerLimitMonitoringTime
member.description: Monitoring time for the lower limit violation
